result.reason: Open Connection File menu fails when SQL Server mode is active because the synchronizer is updated AFTER LoadConnections instead of before, causing a race condition where SqlConnectionsUpdateChecker reverts the switch back to SQL mode.
result.approach: Move UpdateRemoteConnectionsSynchronizer() call to before ConnectionsService.LoadConnections() in the withDialog=true path, so the old SqlConnectionsUpdateChecker is disposed before the file-based load begins. This prevents the SQL synchronizer from detecting a 'change' and reverting back to database mode mid-load.
